newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SIMEX Brent untraded and steady, NYMEX drifts down.
newsitem.headline: SIMEX Brent untraded and steady, NYMEX drifts down.

text.p: June Brent crude futures were untraded at midday on Wednesday in Asia, quoted around the day-earlier London close amid neutral API data.
June Brent on SIMEX was quoted at $18.55/$18.67 per barrel, compared with London's settlement of $18.61. London Brent rose 34 cents on the day.
June NYMEX crude, trading on ACCESS, was last traded at $20.34, down 10 cents from New York and near the intraday low of $20.33. The contract rose 53 in New York.
Traders and brokers said the API data from the U.S. overnight was broadly neutral, so some players were taking the opportunity to book some profits on ACCESS.
